name: SkillSal
_source: speak;Skill;I knew I recognised you!|I'm surprised nobody else seems to remember such a vile TRAITOR!
speak;Sal;Skill?!|I know this looks bad, but please listen to me...
speak;Skill;Hmph, you are the spitting image of your foul necromancer father.|A traitor to the Goddess AND Aurelia.
speak;Sal;Lord Sages did not put this into motion, you must see reason, surely...
speak;Skill;Reason? The only reason I have is a reason to slice your head from your body!
speak;Sal;Now I remember why I was glad to leave...
